ing: 1 tablespoon white sugar, or more to taste
des: "Ground beef is fried with ginger, soy sauce, sake and mirin for a quick and easy mid-week meal. Serve with rice."
ins: Heat a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir beef until cooked through, 5 to 7 minutes. Add ginger and stir well. Stir soy sauce, sake, mirin, and sugar into beef mixture; bring to a boil and cook for 1 minute more.
